song.englishname: The Hand That Holds The World

english.segment1: No greater joy. Is there than this. To know for what. We're meant to live
english.segment2: To hold Your hand. To touch Your face. To find ourselves. In loves embrace
english.segment3: I want to stand before the King. Join in the song that heaven sings. I want to hold the hand that holds the world
english.segment4: I want to know the mystery. Reach out and touch the majesty. I want to hold the hand tht holds the world
english.segment5: No greater love. Could be bestowed. That You would name us as your own
english.segment6: Your daughters sing. Your sons rejoice. They gather here before Your throne
english.segment7: You are, You are. The author of creation. We are, the children of your heart
english.segment8: You are, You are, The light of all the heaven. We rise, to worship all You are
